body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Cast a white creature spell
2. Cast Ring of Thune and equip it to the white creature. It'll get vigilance
3. next owner's upkeep phase it will not get a +1/+1 counter What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Ring of Thune does not award the +1/+1 counter. Same goes for Kalonia and Evos Isle.
